title: Steamed Thai chicken noodle salad
description: A deliciously light and zingy salad. Thai basil has a more intense, citrus flavour, but you can use ordinary European basil in a pinch.
ingredients: 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips
10cm/4in piece fresh ginger, peeled and roughly chopped
3 red chillies, seeds removed, finely chopped
